python3 20200914_runYASS.py --bin ../genomegraph/seedFindingPaper/yass/src/yass --pairs ../genomegraph/projects2018-geometric_hashing/seedFinding/testdata/yass/orthologPairs.json --input ../genomegraph/projects2018-geometric_hashing/seedFinding/testdata/yass/*.fa -o ../genomegraph/projects2018-geometric_hashing/seedFinding/testdata/yass --cds ../genomegraph/projects2018-geometric_hashing/seedFinding/testdata/yass/cds.json --weight 13 --output-matches --epsilon 5 --indel-rate 8 --mutation-rate 15
